sub_title: MBA | Business development | Freelance Translator/ Interpreter | Senior Finance professional
summary:
I am a highly motivated finance professional with over 15 years of experience in the field of Finance and Accounting, global trade business, E-Commerce, Digital Marketing. I add value through setting clear structure and action-planning in order to achieve results.

Solid Accounting software skills: Exact Globe, Exact Online, Microsoft Dynamics AX, Yardi Voyager, LucaNet, eFront, TITAN, QuickBooks, SAP.

Computer skills: MS Word, Excel advanced, PowerPoint, Projects, SPSS, Navision/ERP.
